lead_paragraph: Ronny Ackermann of Germany won his third Nordic combined World Cup event of the season ahead of Bill Demong of the United States in Val di Fiemme, Italy. Ackermann completed the two jumps and cross-country race in a combined time of 41:52.2. Demong finished 34.1 seconds behind.
